title: Canada’s Actions Are America’s Future | Guests: James Lindsay & Chad Prather | 2/17/22
description:
Glenn discusses all the ways Canada is abusing emergency powers to fight those who disagree and kick-start the Great Reset. Canada is manipulating banks to cripple those protesting. Glenn goes through the insurers who were involved with the Remington settlement. Glenn shares a priceless artifact to honor Rush Limbaugh on the one-year anniversary of his passing. Author James Lindsay joins to discuss his new book, “Race Marxism: The Truth About Critical Race Theory and Praxis," and the Great Reset. BlazeTV’s Chad Prather joins Glenn to discuss his Texas gubernatorial run and what’s happening in Canada. The person who hacked GiveSendGo has allegedly come forward, so why is he walking free?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
